text: is a Japanese football player. She plays for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Hasegawa was born in Miyagi Prefecture on January 29, 1997. She joined Nippon TV Beleza (later Nippon TV Tokyo Verdy Beleza) from their youth team in 2013. She was selected Best Eleven for 4 years in a row (2017-2020). In 2021, she signed with AC Milan. Hasegawa was a member of the Japan U-17 national team during the 2012 and 2014 U-17 World Cup. In 2014, the U-17 Japan team won the championship. She was also a member of the Japan U-20 team for the 2016 U-20 World Cup, when Japan won third place. In 2017, she was selected for the Japan national team for the 2017 Algarve Cup. At this competition, on March 1, she played against Spain. In 2018, she played at the 2018 Asian Cup and Japan won the championship. She also played at 2018 Asian Games and Japan won the champions.
